documentation.synopsis:
This App is an interface to Tritech Micron Data Modem. You can : *Send/receive messages from/to other Tritech Micron Data Modem that are configured. Communication is allowed between master and slave, not between two masters or between two slaves. * Configure a modem as master/slave.
To configure a modem (to master for the example) : Send MODEM_CONFIGURATION_REQUIRED="master" to MOOSDB. Reboot the modem with a magnetic field (below Tritech 24V DC sticker near "main" port of the modem) to put it in config mode. The magnet could be powered off when the app publish MODEM_IS_ALIVE with value "true". Let the app do the job. When the app send the boolean variable "MODEM_CONFIGURATION_COMPLETE", configuration sequence is complete an the modem can be rebooted without the magnet.
